about_the_game:
Valley of Tribes is a 1v1v1 strategy game where three tribes battle to be the last tribe standing. Send units and construct buildings to destroy enemy tribes and ensure your tribe's survival. The game consists of a day/night cycle where you plan your actions during the night while nobody can see and then those actions are executed simultaneously once it reaches day.

Construct Buildings. Buildings are an essential part of keeping your tribe alive. Construct defensive towers to defend your tribe against enemy attacks, or build resource harvesters to boost your tribe's economy. The more resources you have, the more actions you can take.

Send Units. Attacking with units is the only way to win the game. Whether you swarm your enemy with mushrooms or send archers to take the other tribes out from afar, just remember that your enemies could have the same idea.

Climb The Ranks. Want to prove your skills? Valley of tribes has a ranked ladder where players gain LP to reach rank milestones and show that they can be the best player in the game.

Level Up Your Tribe. As you play games you will gather experience towards the tribe you were playing. Reaching certain levels will give that tribe bonuses to help take out your enemies more swiftly.
